thread.title: Behlman Electronics Announces It May Have Discovered the Worlds Oldest Regularly Used Behlman AC Power Supply
thread.title_full: Behlman Electronics Announces It May Have Discovered the Worlds Oldest Regularly Used Behlman AC Power Supply - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Behlman Electronics Announces It May Have Discovered the Worlds Oldest Regularly Used Behlman AC Power Supply
text:
Purchased in 1984, this Behlman KBT-100 Power Supply came back 31 years later for a tune-up.
Hauppauge, NY (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Behlman Electronics Inc., known for its leadership in providing power products for military shipboard, airborne and mobile programs, as well as for industrial and commercial applications, has announced that a Behlman KBT-100 AC power supply, among many purchased in 1984, was recently received at Behlman’s Factory Service Center for a tune-up.
The agreement between Behlman and this customer required that Behlman support their KBT-100 Power Supplies for twenty years. Today, thirty-one years later, Behlman is still standing behind this product.
Behlman KBT 100 AC Power Supplies were designed and manufactured in 1984 to support ground-based missile verification sets in ballistic missile systems. They have been operating successfully for more than three decades, in rugged environments worldwide.
According to Behlman Electronics President Ron Storm, “It does not surprise me to learn that Behlman Power Supplies manufactured decades ago are still serving their owners’ power needs today. That results from the unwavering commitment to reliability that has been Behlman’s hallmark for over fifty years.”
There are now 34 different ultra-reliable COTS Behlman AC Power Supplies to choose from. They provide clean, accurate, easy-to-use, “right-on-spec” AC for virtually any purpose. Data sheets for all are immediately available at http://www.behlman.com .
Behlman Electronics Inc., ( http://www.behlman.com ), a subsidiary of Orbit International Corp., manufactures and sells high-quality standard, modified-standard, custom and COTS power solutions, including AC power supplies, frequency converters, inverters, DC-DC, AC-DC, DC-AC, uninterruptible power supplies, and the VPXtra® line of VPX/VME power supplies.
Orbit International Corp., based in Hauppauge, New York, is involved in the manufacture of customized electronic components and subsystems for military and nonmilitary government applications. Other subsidiaries and divisions include Orbit Instrument, Tulip Development Laboratory, and Integrated Combat Systems, all of which are members of the Orbit Electronics Group.
For more information, contact Behlman Electronics Inc., 80 Cabot Court, Hauppauge, New York 11788 USA; TEL: +1 631 435-0410; FAX: +1 631 951-4341; sales(at)behlman(dot)com; http://www.behlman.com .
